name: Paul Otto
bio: I enjoy writing Go for its simple, minimalist syntax. Mentoring in Go is a joy, thanks to its opinionated nature ('The Go Way'). I write and review Go professionally, as well as in side projects.

name: Fabio Falzoi
bio: SwEng since 2012, I have experience in various software engineering fields: from Linux kernel and embedded programming, to big data and web applications. I started using Go and immediately felt in love with it: now I use it and teach it professionally.
